title: Charming 1 Bedroom Loft AVL NOW MagC
posting_body: ['Charming Detached Cottage - 1 Bedroom Loft - Walk to Downtown Oakland: Mag-C', 'Property Address', '1031 Magnolia Street | Apt 1031 | Oakland, CA 94607', 'Available: 08/01/2022', 'Offered By', 'Kasa Properties', 'Description', '*2095 lease price, $100/month concession back for the initial term of the lease', 'Enjoy quiet living in this cozy Victorian building walking distance to downtown Oakland!', 'Walkthrough Video: https://youtu.be/waxHqYcn_s4', 'Schedule a tour: <URL>', 'KEY FEATURES', 'Bedrooms: 1 Bed', 'Bathrooms: 1 Bath', 'Lease Duration: 12 months', 'Pets Policy: Pets Under 80 lbs Welcome (See Details Below)', 'Laundry: No Laundry on Site', 'Floor: Ground', 'Property Type: Detached Cottage', 'RENTAL FEATURES', 'Living room', 'Range / Oven', 'Refrigerator', 'Cable-ready', 'Vinyl wood floor', 'Shared Garden', 'LEASE TERMS', 'Pet: $75-100 added to the base month per pet', 'Water & Garbage passed through based on occupancy', 'Smoking is not permitted on the premises.', "NOTE: The City of Oakland's Fair Chance Housing Ordinance requires that rental housing providers display this notice to applicants - <URL> Ordinance.Tenant-Notice.10.5.2020.pdf", 'Details', 'Beds/Baths: 1BD/1.0BA', 'Rental Terms', 'Rent: $1,995.00', 'Available: 08/01/2022', 'Application Fee: $45.00', 'Security Deposit: $3,142.50', 'Pet Policy', 'Cats allowed', 'Dogs allowed']
